Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and SW-Checklist Completed across all variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Checklist Completed to be executed after SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Average duration of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion when followed by Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded compared to when followed directly by SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded'

Name: Time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to Manuscript Export Succeeded in cases that end with SW-EIC Reject versus those that proceed to reviewer assignment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Checklist Completed after SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion in variants that include reminder activities (e.g., SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days) versus those that do not
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion in submissions that undergo multiple co-author account creations versus standard submissions
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission'

Name: Time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to the first occurrence of any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Initial Reviewer Selection or SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and SW-EIC Reject in rejected manuscripts that never reach reviewer assignment
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to the end of the process for manuscripts that are eventually accepted versus those that are rejected or require major revisions
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Time of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion phase in variants where checklist completion is delayed by reminders compared to variants where it completes immediately
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Total time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in multi-round revision cases versus single-round cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and the final Manuscript Export Succeeded event in accepted papers that go through the full review cycle
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to transition to a plagiarism check (Plagiarism Originality Report Completed) across different submission types
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'
